column2: Elven]] King [[Thingol]] of [[Doriath]] in the [[First Age]].<ref>{{S
column3: 21}}</ref>  Thingol apparently prized his weapon; when [[Beleg]] asked Thingol for a sword of worth for his quest to seek [[Túrin]], the King said he could have his choice of any except his own.<ref>{{CH
column4: 5}}, p. 96</ref>  After his death the sword was passed on to his descendants and [[Elwing]] rescued it from the [[Second Kinslaying]].
